https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/r8JzLi0x2aSx4JnEMi6VFwM75eA.jpg Directed by Xu Kerr. Centuries of unchecked industrialization have left Earth unsuitable for supporting human life. Rather than trying to restore the ravaged planet, humanity has learned to embrace its changing environment. AniMen: The Galactic Battle
